rules.text: Activities must restore degraded forestlands and demonstrate additionality using Tool 01 or equivalent.
rules.title: Activities must restore degraded forestlands and demonstrate additionality using Tool 01 or equivalent.
when: Project lands classified as degraded prior to start.
Alternative land-use scenario demonstrates lower carbon sequestration.

rules.text: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data and validated management practices.
rules.title: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data and validated management practices.
when: Baseline scenario documentation provided for DOE review.
Land-use maps consistent with national inventory data.

rules.text: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
rules.title: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
when: Fuel consumption logged with calibrated meters.
Fertilizer application records preserved for verification.

rules.text: Leakage from wood product displacement addressed using standardized factors in Tool 14.
rules.title: Leakage from wood product displacement addressed using standardized factors in Tool 14.
when: Mitigation measures documented in monitoring report.

rules.text: Non-permanence buffer share determined via Tool 15 and recorded in registry accounts.
rules.title: Non-permanence buffer share determined via Tool 15 and recorded in registry accounts.
when: Buffer contribution documented alongside issuance request.

rules.text: Permanent plots re-measured at least every five years with QA/QC according to Tool 16.
rules.title: Permanent plots re-measured at least every five years with QA/QC according to Tool 16.
when: Sample plot network georeferenced and maintained.
Remote sensing imagery archived for DOE review.

rules.text: Combined sampling uncertainty must remain below 10% at 90% confidence or be conservatively adjusted.
rules.title: Combined sampling uncertainty must remain below 10% at 90% confidence or be conservatively adjusted.
when: Variance analysis submitted with monitoring report.

rules.text: Monitoring reports contain geospatial data, field measurements, emission sources, and buffer contributions.
rules.title: Monitoring reports contain geospatial data, field measurements, emission sources, and buffer contributions.
when: DOE verifies completeness of supporting documentation.
